text: ab isake pashchaat ki tumhaare paas gyaan aa chuka hai, koee tumase is vishay mein kutark kare to kah do, "aao, ham apane beton ko bula len aur tum bhee apane beton ko bula lo, aur ham apanee striyon ko bula len aur tum bhee apanee striyon ko bula lo, aur ham apane ko aur tum apane ko le aao, phir milakar praarthana karen aur jhoothon par allaah kee laanat bheje.
